feature: Add image optimization guidelines and asset documentation
description: The images/ folder contains a 13.9MB profile image (6510x4286 Canon EOS R photo) which is extremely large for web use. This spec creates documentation for image requirements, optimization practices, and updates HTML for responsive images to dramatically improve page load performance.

phases.name: Asset Documentation
phases.description: Create comprehensive documentation for image guidelines and asset management

subtasks.title: Create IMAGES.md documentation
subtasks.description: Create docs/IMAGES.md with comprehensive image optimization guidelines including: recommended file formats (WebP/JPEG/PNG usage), maximum file sizes per image type (profile: 200KB, Open Graph: 300KB, content images: 500KB), recommended dimensions for different contexts, lazy loading requirements, and optimization workflow using tools like squoosh.app or ImageOptim.
acceptance_criteria: docs/IMAGES.md exists with clear sections for formats, sizes, dimensions
Includes specific size limits for profile, OG, and content images
Documents recommended optimization tools and workflow
subtasks.notes: docs/IMAGES.md created with comprehensive 427-line documentation including file format guidelines, size limits, dimensions, lazy loading, optimization workflow with squoosh.app/ImageOptim, responsive images, and common pitfalls. Committed in 4759984.

subtasks.title: Add .gitattributes for binary files
subtasks.description: Create or update .gitattributes to properly handle image binary files with Git LFS consideration and ensure proper line ending handling.
acceptance_criteria: Proper binary handling configured for jpg, png, webp, gif, svg

phases.name: Image Optimization Preparation
phases.description: Create optimized versions of existing images and update HTML for responsive delivery

subtasks.title: Document profile image optimization requirements
subtasks.description: The current profile.jpg is 13.9MB at 6510x4286 resolution. Add specific optimization instructions to IMAGES.md: resize to max 1200px width for main display, create 580px version for inline display (matching content-width CSS variable), target file size under 200KB. Document the process and add a checklist for image optimization.
acceptance_criteria: IMAGES.md includes specific optimization steps for profile.jpg
Recommended dimensions documented (580px width for content display)

subtasks.title: Update HTML with responsive image markup
subtasks.description: Update index.html profile image tag to include width/height attributes for CLS prevention, add explicit dimensions, and document the srcset pattern for when optimized images are available. Ensure loading='lazy' is maintained.
acceptance_criteria: Profile image tag includes width and height attributes
Dimensions set appropriately for content display
Comment added noting future srcset optimization

phases.name: Quality Assurance
phases.description: Verify documentation completeness and HTML correctness

subtasks.title: Validate HTML and documentation
subtasks.description: Ensure all HTML changes are valid and documentation is clear and actionable. Verify that the image optimization workflow is documented step-by-step. Create build-progress.txt with summary of changes.
acceptance_criteria: All image requirements are clearly specified

final_acceptance: docs/IMAGES.md exists with comprehensive image guidelines
index.html updated with improved image markup
Clear optimization workflow documented for content creators
All acceptance criteria for subtasks are met

current_issues: profile.jpg is 13.9MB (6510x4286 Canon EOS R raw export) - 70x larger than recommended
No documentation for image requirements exists
Profile image used for both display and Open Graph without optimization
No explicit dimensions on img tags (causes CLS issues)
target_outcomes: Comprehensive IMAGES.md documentation with actionable guidelines
Clear size/dimension limits for all image types (profile <200KB, OG <300KB, content <500KB)
HTML updated with proper img attributes for performance
Step-by-step optimization workflow for content maintainers
technical_notes: Profile image should be max 580px width for inline display (matches --content-width CSS variable)
Open Graph images should be 1200x630 for optimal social sharing
WebP format recommended with JPEG fallback for browser compatibility
Actual image file optimization requires external tools (squoosh.app, ImageOptim)
